name: The Idiot's Tale (itch)
description:
Can you find all three treasures and save the day? Or are you just gonna run away like an idiot?

The Idiot's Tale is Megalithic Mainframe's point-and-click adventure game classic - an old-school experience with a truly warped sense of humor.

You are Sir Jimothy Quest, a noble-but-ignorant knight charged with the duty of searching the land to find the kingdom's lost treasures. Along the way, you'll encounter fearsome monsters, classic fairy tale characters, and corporate fast food.  Relive the point-and-click joys of old with a barrage of strange dialog trees, insane logic, and more puzzles than you can shake your cursor at.

  • "A lighthearted comedic romp with a healthy dose of parody" (Adventure Gamers, 4/5)
  • "If you're a fan of classic LucasArts and Sierra adventure games -- or if you're just in need of some laughs -- you're bound to enjoy The Idiot's Tale" (Just Adventure, B+)
  • "The Idiot's Tale is a very fun game with original, humorous puzzles, funny dialogues, infectious music and a crazy main character that you immediately put in your heart." (Adventurespel.nl)
  • "Good humor, beautiful looks, smart puzzles" (Adventure's Index, 3/5)

---

  • First Place Winner, Indie Developer Games Showcase (Heartland Gaming Expo, 2016)
  • First Place Winner, Interactive Media (Nescatunga Arts Festival, 2018)
